title: musure toLeyabhEku
sahitya:
musure toLeyabhEku I manasina musure toLeyabhEku


anupallavi

  musure toLeyabhEku kusukusu biDa bhEku Isha prEraNeyembo hasiya hullanu hAki


caraNam 1    aSTamadadinda suTTa I pAtreya viSNu nmavembo krSNA nadiylli
    caraNam 2    kAma krOdhadnda benda I pAtreya rAma krSNanembo hEmA nadiyalli
    caraNam 3    viSavembo pAtreya musure toLadiTTu bisajAkSa purandara viTTala garpisO nitya
